QuestData.Title: Dances With Ravenbears
QuestData.Description:
<The chieftain beckons for the ravenbears to gather the tribute and gestures toward the ritual circle outside.>
Caw! Caw ca-caw!
<It looks like he wants you to follow.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Help the Blackfeather ravenbears perform their tribute ritual.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems that Nithogg wasn't interested in the ravenbears' tribute.$B$BIt's probably a good idea to get out of here before he comes back...
